Articles.Content:
What do you want in 0.38? Maybe better aerodynamics or multiplayer? Please let me know!

note: this is just a parody on all those other speculation threads

Edited May 26, 2014 by pauldbk99
I'm hoping for some improvements to the other star systems. Right now they're kind of bland. They should've fixed them in 0.36, really.
Y'know, I think those 10.5625m parts we got back in .31.1.1.1.2 are a bit underpowered. Maybe some nice 25m parts?

I'm hoping science will finally be made into something more... science like.

Where leaving seismometers on the ground for longer will gather more data, which converts to larger science points. Exposing the materials lab for longer will give more data. Moving around with the gravity measuring thing, and that new magnetometer should also give more science.

I'm hoping science will finally be made into something more... science like.

Where leaving seismometers on the ground for longer will gather more data, which converts to larger science points. Exposing the materials lab for longer will give more data. Moving around with the gravity measuring thing, and that new magnetometer should also give more science.

You know, this may be a parody but I quite like your thoughts on science. I'd love it if each science widget demanded jumping through a different hoop.
I hope 0.38 includes better aerodynamics and more cockpit IVAs.

I hope 0.38 includes better aerodynamics and more cockpit IVAs.

This one is probably accurate!

I really thought they fixed the "wavy spinning pole" bug back in 0.37. Apparently not. [insert future image here]

Edited May 26, 2014 by spink00
from the FUTURE
i think some of the killstreaks are underpowered and could use a buff. they havent been changed since 0.31
they still haven't added cockpit internals for mk2 and mk3 pods...

they still haven't added cockpit internals for mk2 and mk3 pods...

Meh, no one does spaceplanes since jets and intake spam got nerfed in 0.29.

EDIT: original was boring

I still can't find a good way of flying a plane, even after 0.30 added autopilots, and 0.32.2 added better aerodynamics...

This thread has been moved to the off-topic sub-forum, so that no one mistakes it for information about the game.

(You *know* somebody would come along and say, ".38 IS OUT?! HOW DID I MISS IT?!?!" )

(You *know* somebody would come along and say, ".38 IS OUT?! HOW DID I MISS IT?!?!" )

"Everything is ok, you just were in cryogenic sleep for 9999999999999 years."
I really hope they fix that rounding error on pi. Things just don't quite work out right when it's not set to four.

"Everything is ok, you just were in cryogenic sleep for 9999999999999 years."

*sigh* portal quotes...

I hope the IVA for all pods is added by then...

*sigh* portal quotes...

I hope the IVA for all pods is added by then...

The universe will be destroyed by then...
Well I'm hoping they fix the female Kerbal's outfits in the .35 character creator. I mean c'mon, original Star Trek series mini-skirts?!!!!

The universe will be destroyed by then...

Maybe the devs will add heat death to the Kerbal universe, and we can play in that.

Or is that something that should be left to an expansion pack?
I heard that an expansion pack is planed as soon as EA get their hands on squad.

So my rover with the new Monster 40-meter wheels got smacked by a dust storm on Duna and flipped over. I hope they buff jumbo RCS ports in .38.

Also, they should make Jool's rings more fine and less pronounced. They look too visible - the Saturn analogue is the next planet down, guys.

And why does the Rubble Telescope Eye weigh so much? It's around six tons. Squad nerf weight pl0x
I also heard that you can unlock playing as humans in the next NASA collab x-pack!
Warp drives are broken again. I'm tired of seeing only half a Kerbal make it to the destination. Do you think that they will fix it in 0.38.05.41?

I also heard that you can unlock playing as humans in the next NASA collab x-pack!

I heard they're going to be the enemy, finally someone to shoot at with all those weapons added in 0.33.
ever since 0.29.2.3.42.23424.2149.rememberthatmarsupial added the TARDIS and Plumbobs and the Universal Transference Catapult. I think they need to be nerfed.
